org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.analyzer.impl

Class Elasticsearch52AnalyzerStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.analyzer.impl.Elasticsearch2AnalyzerStrategy
      • org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.analyzer.impl.Elasticsearch52AnalyzerStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnalyzerStrategy

    public class Elasticsearch52AnalyzerStrategy
extends Elasticsearch2AnalyzerStrategy
    An AnalyzerStrategy for Elasticsearch 5.2: normalizers are actually translated as normalizers in ES, instead of being translated as analyzers like in Elasticsearch2AnalyzerStrategy.
    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere
